quote: Every artist was first an amateur.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Art is a lie that makes us realize truth.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: The chief enemy of creativity is 'good' taste.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Inspiration exists, but it has to find you working.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Art enables us to find ourselves and lose ourselves at the same time.
author: Thomas Merton

quote: You canâ€™t use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: The painter tries to master color, but the color always masters the painter.
author: Marc Chagall

quote: Great things are done by a series of small things brought together.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: The object of art is not to reproduce reality, but to create a reality of the same intensity.
author: Alberto Giacometti

quote: The worst enemy to creativity is self-doubt.
author: Sylvia Plath

quote: An artist is not paid for his labor but for his vision.
author: James McNeill Whistler

quote: Art should comfort the disturbed and disturb the comfortable.
author: Cesar Cruz
